name: Providence Foundation of San Francisco
description: PFSF's mission is to improve the quality of life in low-income communities and to empower individuals to become self-reliant by providing programs, services, education, and training utilizing a comprehensive community-based approach.
fullDescription: PFSF's mission is to improve the quality of life in low-income communities and to empower individuals to become self-reliant by providing programs, services, education, and training utilizing a comprehensive community-based approach.
